Class Listener

java.lang.Object
listenerutil.Listener
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProjectConstants, org.testng.ISuiteListener, org.testng.ITestListener, org.testng.ITestNGListener
public class Listener extends Object implements org.testng.ITestListener, org.testng.ISuiteListener, ProjectConstants
Listener class that implements TestNG's ITestListener and ISuiteListener interfaces to manage test execution events and generate reports using ExtentReports. It captures test start, success, failure, and skip events, and logs them accordingly.
Since:
2025-06-02
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ravi Shankar

    • onTestFailedButWithinSuccessPercentage

      Specified by:
